title: Activate a change model
content:
Note You must have the appropriate permissions to be able to activate a change model.

To activate a change model means changing its status, as shown in the workflow snapshot at the top of the model, from draft to active.

  1. From the main menu, select Build > Change > Models.

  2. Select the change model.

    Click the record identifier in the ID column to display the selected record.

  3. Click Active, and then Save.

Related topics

  • How to create a change model
  • How to edit a change model
  • How to retire a change model
